name: errorlens
description: Improve highlighting of errors, warnings and other language diagnostics.

errorLens.useColorContributions.markdownDescription: Use color contributions instead of settings. Colors can be contributed by themes. It's also possible to change them in `workbench.colorCustomizations` property in **`settings.json`**

errorLens.errorBackground.description: Background color of the entire line containing error.

errorLens.errorForeground.description: Text color of the error problem message.

errorLens.errorMessageBackground.description: Background color of the error message.

errorLens.warningBackground.description: Background color of the entire line containing warning.

errorLens.warningForeground.description: Text color used to highlight lines containing warnings.

errorLens.warningMessageBackground.description: Background color of the warning message.

errorLens.infoBackground.description: Background color of the entire line containing info.

errorLens.infoForeground.description: Text color used to highlight lines containing info.

errorLens.infoMessageBackground.description: Background color of the info message.

errorLens.hintBackground.description: Background color of the entire line containing hint.

errorLens.hintForeground.description: Text color used to highlight lines containing hints.

errorLens.hintMessageBackground.description: Background color of the hint message.

errorLens.fontWeight.description: Specifies the font weight for ErrorLens annotations.

errorLens.fontStyleItalic.description: Show ErrorLens annotations in Italics, or not?

errorLens.fontSize.description: Font size for text (problem messages). (CSS units)

errorLens.margin.description: Distance between the end of the line and the start of annotation. (CSS units)

errorLens.enabledDiagnosticLevels.description: Specify which diagnostic levels are enhanced. e.g. [ 'error', 'warning' ]. Valid values are any or all of: 'error', 'warning', 'info' & 'hint'

errorLens.annotationPrefix.markdownDescription: Specify diagnostic message prefixes (when `addAnnotationTextPrefixes` is true). For example emoji ❌ ⚠ ℹ.

errorLens.addAnnotationTextPrefixes.description: If 'true', prefixes the diagnostic severity ('ERROR:', 'WARNING:' etc) to ErrorLens annotations.

errorLens.exclude.description: Specify messages that should not be highlighted (RegEx).

errorLens.light.description: Specify color of decorations for when the light color theme is active.

errorBackground.description: Background color used to highlight lines containing errors.

errorForeground.description: Text color used to highlight lines containing errors.

warningBackground.description: Background color used to highlight lines containing warnings.

warningForeground.description: Text color used to highlight lines containing warnings.

infoBackground.description: Background color used to highlight lines containing info.

infoForeground.description: Text color used to highlight lines containing info.

hintBackground.description: Background color used to highlight lines containing hints.

hintForeground.description: Text color used to highlight lines containing hints.

errorGutterIconPath.description: Absolute path to error gutter icon for light themes.

warningGutterIconPath.description: Absolute path to warning gutter icon for light themes.

infoGutterIconPath.description: Absolute path to info gutter icon for light themes.

errorGutterIconColor.markdownDescription: Error color of `circle` gutter icon set for light themes.

warningGutterIconColor.markdownDescription: Warning color of `circle` gutter icon set for light themes.

infoGutterIconColor.markdownDescription: Info color of `circle` gutter icon set for light themes.

errorLens.onSave.description: If `true` - update decorations only on save.

enumDescriptions: Highlight only the problem at the cursor
Highlight only closest to the cursor problem
errorLens.followCursor.description: Highlight only portion of the problems.

errorLens.followCursorMore.markdownDescription:
Augments `followCursor`.
Adds number of lines to top and bottom when `followCursor` is `activeLine`.
 Adds number of closest problems when `followCursor` is `closestProblem`

errorLens.gutterIconsEnabled.description: If `true` - show error/warning/info icons in the gutter (In place of debug breakpoint icon).

enumDescriptions: Similar to vscode icons in Problems Panel (old).
Similar to vscode icons in Problems Panel (new).
Similar to vscode icons in Problems Panel, only without a border.

errorLens.editorActiveTabDecorationEnabl.markdownDescription: When `true` - updates `tab.activeBackground` if the file has errors
